title: Designer Jonathan Adler on Branding, Barneys & What's Next
description: Jonathan Adler, chief creative officer, and Mary Beth Sheridan, president of Jonathan Adler, discuss how tariff uncertainty is weighing on luxury goods with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
